name: Slayaway Camp 2: Netflix & Kill
storyline: Leave no survivors. In this sequel, you're Skullface, a killer stuck inside a retro horror movie catalog — solve puzzles, stalk victims and get stabby.
summary: Puzzle and horror fan? Dive into the hilarious Slayaway Camp 2: Netflix & Kill. This tongue-in-cheek adventure game offers a killer mix of horror and comedy.
